data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the Andean leaf-eared mouse, Phyllotis andium Thomas 1912 (Rodentia: Cricetidae), with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rengifo, Edgardo M., Pacheco, Víctor (2015): Taxonomic revision of the Andean leaf-eared mouse, Phyllotis andium Thomas 1912 (Rodentia: Cricetidae), with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 4018 (3): 349-380, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4018.3.2
